department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a bid for the supply and delivery of one (1)  Highway Tractor to Jasper, Alberta.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-02-23 at 2:00PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00PMEST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Parks Canada Agency has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) Highway Tractor to Jasper, Alberta. Delivery is requested by no later than March 30,2024.
